roleset.name: make moderate, mild

role.descr: thing that would be extreme otherwise
specific aspect of arg1 that is moderate

example.name: agentive
example.text: Some climate models project that interior regions of Asia would be among the first to heat up in a global warming because they are far from oceans, which *trace* moderate temperature changes.

example.name: ergative
example.text: At the same time, last week's consumer price index showed that inflation is moderating.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'moderate' based on sentences in wsj. VN class other_cos-45.4.

roleset.name: to preside over; proctor

example.name: Whole sentance usage
example.text: [She-1] was chosen [* -1 ] to moderate the convention.

roleset.note: Based on sentence in Bolt data. Comparison to preside and monitor. No VN class. Framed by Katie.
